snippet.title: Pokemon Water Red [Completed] - GBA Game With New Evolutions,New Moves,New Types!
snippet.description:
Pokemon Water Red [Completed] - GBA Game With New Evolutions,New Moves,New Types!
========================================================

💎Pokemon Water Red:- The storyline is Fire Red Storyline, The Great Feature in this game is alternate forms. We can’t have over 200 Pokemon in new alternate forms with new type, new abilities. About the music, We can have new moves such as Firebreath. Free Ray and more and more.

💎Features:
• Around 200 Pokemon in new alternate forms. These range from simple palette swaps for some, to huge changes on others. This number will keep on growing as ideas spout into my mind.
• New moves, such as Firebreath, Freeze Ray, Magmarock, Iron Slam and more.
• Certain moves, which in the original FR/LG are awful, have been buffed or changed. Examples include damage-dealing Electric-type Flash, Giga Drain at its later-generation stats, Steel-type Cut and more.
• New Evolution stones in place of previously useless items. (Seeing as one cannot trade Pokemon in this game, and Porygon’s type has been changed, there is no need for an Up-Grade to be in the game as an example.) 
• All Evo stones, old and new are available in the Celadon department store.
• While fully playable due to essentially being FireRed version, not all trainer’s teams and wild encounters are finalized.

⚠️For More Info:
https://www.pokemoner.com/2019/06/pokemon-water-red.html

🎁Subscribe to stay tuned! - http://inurls.co/e43DRl1g

🎈Leave a LIKE if you enjoy and have a great day!

🎁Join Our Discord - https://discord.gg/4UqVD7K

🎯Download Link Of Game -
[Direct Link] - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sL8djviIFLmN6Z3kePF7otB6DxVUsnTv/view

[MEGA] - http://cu5.io/7iy8 (Solve Captcha)

[Mediafire] - http://stfly.io/fzyJEJ (Solve Captcha)

[Openload] - http://cu5.io/QcboH (Solve Captcha)

🎯VisualBoyAdvance (Emulator) - 
http://inurls.co/AQKY (Solve Captcha)

🎯The Background Image I Used -
http://cu5.io/7NKEP (Solve Captcha)

☝️⚠️All rights reserved by the original author for the background image!

⚠️This game is remade by theevilslime. and I downloaded from the pokemoner.com

🎈Song Used:- Fransis Derelle - Fly (feat. Parker Pohill) [NCS Release]

🎁Check Other Pokemon Gameplays - 
==============================

*Pokemon Games With VBA Emulator (GBA Games) - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgOhdX78DKd4nkFK0OD0x2YQC1qsvTKXy

*Pokemon Games With RPGXP Emulator - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgOhdX78DKd7W10SLWaSdcBVb9OtW9gd4

*Get All Legendaries! -
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_AzRMAlvKzk&list=PLgOhdX78DKd4fL5Ld9f76DASmO2-rGnJS

*Pokemon The Movie Game - 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PF_8-hi55b4&list=PLgOhdX78DKd6Q3Pc0Rg7R6mF5p28S1YHs

*Pokemon Fanmade Battles! - 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=07vd3nmDEN4&list=PLgOhdX78DKd4g20sqVa87Wmk6AoffyQGo
